data.eml:eml: A new cave-dwelling species of Lagynochthonius (Arachnida: Pseudoscorpiones: Chthoniidae) from Yunnan Province, China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Li, Yun-Chun, Liu, Huai, Shi, Ai-Min (2019): A new cave-dwelling species of Lagynochthonius (Arachnida: Pseudoscorpiones: Chthoniidae) from Yunnan Province, China. Zootaxa 4571 (1), DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4571.1.2
